entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 16.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 16.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 62 %

Wind: E 17 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 23. UV index 9 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
